arts.ttl: European football: Harry Kane hits hat-trick and Luis Díaz off the mark as Bayern thrash Leipzig
arts.sum: Michael Olise scores twice in 6-0 victory Donnarumma bids farewell to PSG supporters Harry Kane scored a second-half hat-trick and Michael Olise bagged two goals as champions Bayern Munich obliterated visitors RB Leipzig 6-0 in the Bundesliga opener putting down an early marker. Kane opened his account in the 64th minute before bagging two more goals in the 74th and 77th to complete Bayern’s impressive show of strength in the season premiere. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig captain David Raum responds to Bayern defeat: “We got punched in the mouth.”
arts.sum: Newly appointed RB Leipzig captain David Raum didn't mince words when it came time to comment on Friday night's heavy defeat against Bayern in the 2025/26 Bundesliga opener.

arts.ttl: Kane hits hat trick as Bayern routs Leipzig 6-0 in Bundesliga opener
arts.sum: Nusa, who also had a goal ruled out, served to only rile more goals from Kane, who was supported by the outstanding Michael Olise, who scored two, and Luis Díaz, who got the other goal and set up two on his Bundesliga debut. Olise got his second goal two minutes after that, facilitated by Gnabry who eased past two Leipzig defenders to set up the French winger.

arts.ttl: Coments after Bayern's huge victory over Leipzig: "We fell flat on our faces tonight!"
arts.sum: Bayern showed their dominance over RB Leipzig with an incredible 6-0 victory - the highest win in their 23 games against each other. Here are all the comments from players and staff after the match.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane hat-trick propels Bayern Munich to devastating 6-0 opening day win over RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Bayern München began their Bundesliga title defence in stunning fashion with Harry Kane scoring a hat-trick, Michael Olise a brace and Luis Díaz a debut goal in a 6-0 demolition of RB Leipzig at the Allianz Arena. Michael Olise celebrates with teammates after scoring his second goal of the evening, putting Bayern 3-0 up before half-time against a shellshocked RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Hat-trick hero Kane helps Bayern see off Leipzig
arts.sum: England captain Harry Kane scores a hat-trick and ex-Liverpool winger Luis Diaz scores his first Bundesliga goal, as defending champions Bayern Munich begin their league campaign with a 6-0 thrashing of RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: BUNDESLIGA OPENING DAY PLAYER RATINGS | Bayern Munich 6-0 RB Leipzig
arts.sum: After Bayern Munich opened the season with the DFL Super Cup, they now kick off the Bundesliga against RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs RB Leipzig Stats: Bundesliga Live
arts.sum: Can reigning Bundesliga champions Bayern start with a win in 2025-26? Follow the game and analyse the Opta data on our Bayern Munich vs RB Leipzig stats page. The post Bayern Munich vs RB Leipzig Stats: Bundesliga Live appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: TV licence fine warning as BBC football fans can watch Bayern Munich vs RB Leipzig for FREE
arts.sum: The Bundesliga returns on Friday evening when Bayern Munich host RB Leipzig, and while games from the German top flight will be 'free to-air' on UK TV and YouTube, fans will still need a TV licence

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs RB Leipzig – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Bayern Munich and RB Leipzig go head-to-head in the Bundesliga opener on Friday night. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to the campaign, with reigning champions Bayern looking to defend their title. Meanwhile, Leipzig aim to return to European competition after their disappointing seventh-place finish last season.
